item.title: SDN Performance Takes a Leaf of Faith
item.description:
By: John Shepler Cloud computing has highlighted the importance of reliable internet connections, known as WANs (Wide Area Networks). In the past, slow file transfers or unreliable internet were acceptable because crucial tasks were handled within the company’s internal network. However, now that businesses rely on cloud services, the performance of the WAN is just as crucial as the internal network (LAN). WAN Challenges The main challenge with WANs is that businesses don’t control them like they do their internal networks...
